items.sentence: I couldn't attend the party because I was sick.
Tom was too drunk to do what needed to be done.
Tom got out of his car and opened his umbrella.
Tom came to Boston, hoping he could find a job.
The only university Tom applied to was Harvard.
Excuse me, would you mind passing me the sugar?
On a clear day, you can see Mt. Fuji from here.
I clean my room more often than Tom cleans his.
Let's hope that we don't have to do that again.
Tom says he hopes that Mary refuses to do that.
